snippet.title: Wargame: European Escalation - Summer Trailer
snippet.description:
Get it on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/58610/
More info on : http://www.wargame-ee.com/

Wargame: European Escalation, the explosive real-time strategy game developed for PC by Eugen Systems, the creators of R.U.S.E.™ and Act of War: Direct Action, today unveiled its Summer Trailer!

Dive into the heart of a spectacular battle between the forces of NATO and the Warsaw Pact for over a minute of breathtaking fighting! Air raids in helicopters, deployment of infantry and tanks, floods of fires shots and burnt lands, war has never been so realistic! The level of details given to each unit, and the use of the impressive IRISZOOM™ that allows a continuous zoom from a global view to the heart of the action, continue to push the immersion at its peak.

With its incredible graphics engine, and particularly impressive gaming experience, Wargame: European Escalation offers a great show you'll get a taste of, by discovering the Summer Trailer of Wargame; the game is expected in November 2011 on PC.

http://www.wargame-ee.com
